title.raw: 卷七 昭帝紀 Volume 7: Annals of Emperor Zhao

sentences.zh: 孝昭皇帝，武帝少子也。

translations.literal: Filial Emperor Zhao, Emperor Wu youngest son also.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Zhao, the Filial, was Emperor Wu's youngest son.

sentences.zh: 母曰趙婕妤，本以有奇異得幸，及生帝，亦奇異。

translations.literal: Mother called Zhao Jieyu, originally by having extraordinary gained favor, and when gave birth to emperor, also extraordinary.
translations.idiomatic: His mother was Lady Zhao, a concubine who had gained favor through her extraordinary qualities, and the circumstances of his birth were also extraordinary.

sentences.zh: 語在外戚傳。

translations.literal: Words in outer relatives biography.
translations.idiomatic: The story is told in the Biography of the Imperial Relatives.

sentences.zh: 武帝末，戾太子 敗，燕王旦、廣陵王胥行驕嫚，後元二年二月上疾病，遂立昭帝為太子，年八歲。

translations.literal: Emperor Wu end, Li Crown Prince defeated, Yan King Dan, Guangling King Xu conduct arrogant insolent, Houyuan second year second month emperor illness, then established Zhao Emperor as crown prince, age eight years.
translations.idiomatic: In Emperor Wu's later years, after the defeat of Crown Prince Li, King Dan of Yan and King Xu of Guangling behaved arrogantly and insolently. In the second month of the second year of Houyuan, when the emperor fell ill, he established Emperor Zhao as crown prince at age eight.

sentences.zh: 以侍中奉車都尉霍光為大司馬大將軍，受遺詔輔少主。

translations.literal: With Chamberlain Chariot Commandant Huo Guang as Grand Commandant of the Guards, received testamentary decree to assist young lord.
translations.idiomatic: He appointed Huo Guang, Chamberlain and Chariot Commandant, as Grand Commandant of the Guards, who received the testamentary decree to assist the young ruler.

sentences.zh: 明日，武帝崩。

translations.literal: Next day, Emperor Wu passed away.
translations.idiomatic: The next day, Emperor Wu passed away.

sentences.zh: 戊辰，太子 即皇帝位，謁高廟。

translations.literal: Wuchen day, crown prince ascended emperor position, paid respects at high temple.
translations.idiomatic: On the wuchen day, the crown prince ascended the imperial throne and paid respects at the High Temple.

sentences.zh: 帝姊鄂邑公主益湯沐邑，為長公主，共養省中。

translations.literal: Emperor elder sister Eyi Princess increased bath fief, became elder princess, together raised in palace compound.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor's elder sister, Princess Eyi, had her fief increased and was made Elder Princess, and together they were raised within the palace compound.

sentences.zh: 大將軍光秉政，領尚書事，車騎將軍金日磾、左將軍上官桀副焉。

translations.literal: Grand general Guang held government, led Secretariat affairs, Chariot Cavalry General Jin Midi, Left General Shangguan Jie assisted.
translations.idiomatic: Grand General Guang held the government, led the Secretariat affairs, with Chariot Cavalry General Jin Midi and Left General Shangguan Jie as his assistants.

translations.literal: Emperor Zhao, the Filial, was Emperor Wu's youngest son. His mother was Lady Zhao, a concubine who had gained favor through her extraordinary qualities, and the circumstances of his birth were also extraordinary. The story is told in the Biography of the Imperial Relatives. In Emperor Wu's later years, after the defeat of Crown Prince Li, King Dan of Yan and King Xu of Guangling behaved arrogantly and insolently. In the second month of the second year of Houyuan, when the emperor fell ill, he established Emperor Zhao as crown prince at age eight. He appointed Huo Guang, Chamberlain and Chariot Commandant, as Grand Commandant of the Guards, who received the testamentary decree to assist the young ruler. The next day, Emperor Wu passed away. On the wuchen day, the crown prince ascended the imperial throne and paid respects at the High Temple. The emperor's elder sister, Princess Eyi, had her fief increased and was made Elder Princess, and together they were raised within the palace compound. Grand General Guang held the government, led the Secretariat affairs, with Chariot Cavalry General Jin Midi and Left General Shangguan Jie as his assistants.

sentences.zh: 夏六月，赦天下。

translations.literal: Summer sixth month, amnestied the world.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month of summer, there was a general amnesty.

translations.literal: In the sixth month of summer, there was a general amnesty.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，有星孛于東方。
濟北王寬有罪，自殺。
賜長公主及宗室昆弟各有差。
追尊趙婕妤為皇太后，起雲陵。
冬，匈奴入朔方，殺略吏民。
發軍屯西河，左將軍桀行北邊。
始元元年春二月，黃鵠下建章宮太液池中。
公卿上壽。
賜諸侯王、列侯、宗室金錢各有差。

translations.literal: Granted feudal kings, marquises, imperial clan gold money each according to rank.
translations.idiomatic: Gold and money were granted to the feudal kings, marquises, and imperial clans according to their ranks.

translations.literal: Gold and money were granted to the feudal kings, marquises, and imperial clans according to their ranks.

sentences.zh: 己亥，上耕于鉤盾弄田。

translations.literal: Jihai day, emperor plowed at Gou Dun Nong field.
translations.idiomatic: On jihai day, the emperor performed the plowing ceremony at the Gou Dun Nong field.

translations.literal: On jihai day, the emperor performed the plowing ceremony at the Gou Dun Nong field.

sentences.zh: 益封燕王、廣陵王及鄂邑長公主各萬三千戶。

translations.literal: Increased fief Yan King, Guangling King and Eyi Elder Princess each thirteen thousand households.
translations.idiomatic: The fiefs of King Yan, King Guangling, and Elder Princess Eyi were each increased by thirteen thousand households.

translations.literal: The fiefs of King Yan, King Guangling, and Elder Princess Eyi were each increased by thirteen thousand households.

sentences.zh: 夏，為太后起園廟雲陵。

translations.literal: Summer, for empress dowager built garden temple Yunling.
translations.idiomatic: In summer, a garden temple was built for the Empress Dowager at Yunling.

translations.literal: In summer, a garden temple was built for the Empress Dowager at Yunling.

sentences.zh: 益州廉頭、姑繒、牂柯談指、同並二十四邑皆反。

translations.literal: Yizhou Lian Tou, Gu Zheng, Canghai Tan Zhi, Tong Bing twenty four settlements all rebelled.
translations.idiomatic: Twenty-four settlements in Yizhou - Lian Tou, Gu Zheng, Canghai, Tan Zhi, and Tong Bing - all rebelled.

sentences.zh: 遣水衡都尉呂破胡募吏民及發犍為、蜀郡奔命擊益州，大破之。

translations.literal: Sent Water Bureau Commandant Lü Pohu recruit officials people and dispatch Qianwei, Shu commandery urgent troops attack Yizhou, greatly defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: Water Bureau Commandant Lü Pohu was sent to recruit officials and people, and troops were dispatched from Qianwei and Shu commanderies as urgent reinforcements to attack Yizhou, where they achieved a great victory.

translations.literal: Twenty-four settlements in Yizhou - Lian Tou, Gu Zheng, Canghai, Tan Zhi, and Tong Bing - all rebelled. Water Bureau Commandant Lü Pohu was sent to recruit officials and people, and troops were dispatched from Qianwei and Shu commanderies as urgent reinforcements to attack Yizhou, where they achieved a great victory.

sentences.zh: 有司請河內屬冀州，河東屬并州。

translations.literal: Officials requested Henan belong to Jizhou, Hedong belong to Bingzhou.
translations.idiomatic: The officials requested that Henan be assigned to Jizhou and Hedong to Bingzhou.

translations.literal: The officials requested that Henan be assigned to Jizhou and Hedong to Bingzhou.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，赦天下，賜民百戶牛酒。

translations.literal: Autumn seventh month, amnestied the world, granted people hundred households ox wine.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, there was a general amnesty, and oxen and wine were granted to every hundred households.

sentences.zh: 大雨，渭橋絕。

translations.literal: Great rain, Wei bridge broke.
translations.idiomatic: There was heavy rain, and the Wei bridge was washed away.

translations.literal: In the seventh month of autumn, there was a general amnesty, and oxen and wine were granted to every hundred households. There was heavy rain, and the Wei bridge was washed away.

sentences.zh: 八月，齊孝王孫劉澤謀反，欲殺青州刺史雋不疑，發覺，皆伏誅。

translations.literal: Eighth month, Qi Xiao King grandson Liu Ze plotted rebellion, wished to kill Qingzhou Inspector Jun Buyi, discovered, all received execution.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month, Liu Ze, grandson of King Xiao of Qi, plotted rebellion and intended to assassinate Inspector Jun Buyi of Qingzhou. When discovered, they all suffered execution.

sentences.zh: 遷不疑為京兆尹，賜錢百萬。

translations.literal: Transferred Buyi to Jingzhao prefect, granted money one million.
translations.idiomatic: Jun Buyi was transferred to serve as Prefect of Jingzhao and granted one million cash.

translations.literal: In the eighth month, Liu Ze, grandson of King Xiao of Qi, plotted rebellion and intended to assassinate Inspector Jun Buyi of Qingzhou. When discovered, they all suffered execution. Jun Buyi was transferred to serve as Prefect of Jingzhao and granted one million cash.

sentences.zh: 九月丙子，車騎將軍日磾薨。

translations.literal: Ninth month bingzi day, chariot cavalry general Jin Midi passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the bingzi day of the ninth month, Chariot Cavalry General Jin Midi passed away.

translations.literal: On the bingzi day of the ninth month, Chariot Cavalry General Jin Midi passed away.

sentences.zh: 閏月，遣故廷尉王平等五人持節行郡國，舉賢良，問民所疾苦、冤、失職者。

translations.literal: Intercalary month, sent former court judge Wang Ping and others five people holding tally toured commanderies kingdoms, recommended worthy good, asked people what pained bitter, wronged, lost office ones.
translations.idiomatic: In the intercalary month, five men including the former Court Judge Wang Ping were sent holding imperial tallies to tour the commanderies and kingdoms, to recommend worthy and capable men, and to inquire about the people's grievances, injustices, and cases of wrongful dismissal.

translations.literal: In the intercalary month, five men including the former Court Judge Wang Ping were sent holding imperial tallies to tour the commanderies and kingdoms, to recommend worthy and capable men, and to inquire about the people's grievances, injustices, and cases of wrongful dismissal.

sentences.zh: 冬，無冰。

translations.literal: Winter, no ice.
translations.idiomatic: In winter, there was no ice.

translations.literal: In winter, there was no ice.

sentences.zh: 二年春正月，大將軍光、左將軍桀皆以前捕斬反虜重合侯馬通功封，光為博陸侯，桀為安陽侯。

translations.literal: Second year spring first month, grand general Guang, left general Jie all with previous capture behead rebel bandits Chonghe marquis Ma Tong merit enfeoffed, Guang as Bolu marquis, Jie as Anyang marquis.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the second year, Grand General Huo Guang and Left General Shangguan Jie were both enfeoffed for their previous merit in capturing and executing the rebel bandit Marquis Ma Tong of Chonghe. Guang became Marquis of Bolu, Jie became Marquis of Anyang.

translations.literal: In the first month of spring of the second year, Grand General Huo Guang and Left General Shangguan Jie were both enfeoffed for their previous merit in capturing and executing the rebel bandit Marquis Ma Tong of Chonghe. Guang became Marquis of Bolu, Jie became Marquis of Anyang.

sentences.zh: 以宗室毋在位者，舉茂才劉辟彊、劉長樂皆為光祿大夫，辟彊守長樂衛尉。

translations.literal: With imperial clan none in position, recommended excellent talent Liu Pijiang, Liu Changle all as palace gentleman, Pijiang acting Chang Le guard captain.
translations.idiomatic: Since no members of the imperial clan held office, Liu Pijiang and Liu Changle were recommended as men of excellent talent and appointed Palace Gentlemen. Pijiang was made acting Guard Captain of Changle Palace.

translations.literal: Since no members of the imperial clan held office, Liu Pijiang and Liu Changle were recommended as men of excellent talent and appointed Palace Gentlemen. Pijiang was made acting Guard Captain of Changle Palace.

sentences.zh: 三月，遣使者振貸貧民毋種、食者。

translations.literal: Third month, sent envoys relieved loaned poor people without seed, food ones.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, envoys were sent to provide relief aid and loans to poor people lacking seed grain or food.

sentences.zh: 秋八月，詔曰：「往年災害多，今年蠶麥傷，所振貸種、食勿收責，毋令民出今年田租。」

translations.literal: Autumn eighth month, edict said: Previous years disasters many, this year silkworm wheat harmed, what relieved loaned seed, food do not collect responsibility, do not make people pay this year field rent.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month of autumn, an edict stated: 'Previous years had many disasters, this year the silkworms and wheat have been damaged. The relief aid and loans for seed and food are not to be collected, nor are the people to pay this year's land taxes.'

translations.literal: In the third month, envoys were sent to provide relief aid and loans to poor people lacking seed grain or food. In the eighth month of autumn, an edict stated: 'Previous years had many disasters, this year the silkworms and wheat have been damaged. The relief aid and loans for seed and food are not to be collected, nor are the people to pay this year's land taxes.'

sentences.zh: 冬，發習戰射士詣朔方，調故吏將屯田張掖郡。

translations.literal: Winter, dispatched practiced battle archers went to Shuofang, transferred former officials generals garrison farm Zhangye commandery.
translations.idiomatic: In winter, practiced archers were dispatched to Shuofang, and former officials were transferred to command the garrison farms in Zhangye commandery.

translations.literal: In winter, practiced archers were dispatched to Shuofang, and former officials were transferred to command the garrison farms in Zhangye commandery.

sentences.zh: 三年春二月，有星孛于西北。

translations.literal: Third year spring second month, had comet broom star at northwest.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month of spring of the third year, a comet appeared in the northwest.

translations.literal: In the second month of spring of the third year, a comet appeared in the northwest.

sentences.zh: 秋，募民徙雲陵，賜錢田宅。
冬十月，鳳皇集東海，遣使者祠其處。
十一月壬辰朔，日有蝕之。
四年春三月甲寅，立皇后上官氏。
赦天下。
辭訟在後二年前，皆勿聽治。
夏六月，皇后見高廟。
賜長公主、丞相、將軍、列侯、中二千石以下及郎吏宗室錢帛各有差。
徙三輔富人雲陵，賜錢，戶十萬。

translations.literal: Moved Sefu rich people to Yunling, granted money, households one hundred thousand.
translations.idiomatic: The wealthy families of the Three Adjuncts region were moved to Yunling and each household was granted one hundred thousand cash.

translations.literal: The wealthy families of the Three Adjuncts region were moved to Yunling and each household was granted one hundred thousand cash.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，詔曰：「比歲不登，民匱於食，流庸未盡還，往時令民共出馬，其止勿出。

translations.literal: Autumn seventh month, edict said: Recent years not harvest, people lacking food, wandering laborers not all returned, previous time ordered people together provide horses, that stop do not provide.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, an edict stated: 'In recent years the harvests have failed, the people lack food, and the wandering laborers have not all returned. The previous order requiring the people to provide horses together is hereby rescinded.'

sentences.zh: 諸給中都官者，且減之。」

translations.literal: Various supplying central capital officials, temporarily reduce them.
translations.idiomatic: Those supplying the officials of the central capital shall have their contributions temporarily reduced.'

translations.literal: In the seventh month of autumn, an edict stated: 'In recent years the harvests have failed, the people lack food, and the wandering laborers have not all returned. The previous order requiring the people to provide horses together is hereby rescinded.' Those supplying the officials of the central capital shall have their contributions temporarily reduced.'

sentences.zh: 冬，遣大鴻臚田廣明擊益州。

translations.literal: Winter, sent grand herald Tian Guangming attack Yizhou.
translations.idiomatic: In winter, Grand Herald Tian Guangming was sent to attack Yizhou.

translations.literal: In winter, Grand Herald Tian Guangming was sent to attack Yizhou.

sentences.zh: 廷尉李种坐故縱死罪棄市。

translations.literal: Court judge Li Zhong sat on intentionally releasing death penalty executed in market.
translations.idiomatic: Court Judge Li Zhong was convicted of intentionally releasing a death-row prisoner and executed in the marketplace.

translations.literal: Court Judge Li Zhong was convicted of intentionally releasing a death-row prisoner and executed in the marketplace.

sentences.zh: 五年春正月，追尊皇太后父為順成侯。

translations.literal: Fifth year spring first month, posthumously honored empress dowager father as Shun Cheng marquis.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the fifth year, the Empress Dowager's father was posthumously honored as Marquis of Shun Cheng.

translations.literal: In the first month of spring of the fifth year, the Empress Dowager's father was posthumously honored as Marquis of Shun Cheng.

sentences.zh: 夏陽男子張延年詣北闕，自稱衛太子，誣罔，要斬。

translations.literal: Xiayang man Zhang Yannian went to north gate, self-claimed Wei crown prince, deceived misled, demanded execution.
translations.idiomatic: A man from Xiayang named Zhang Yannian went to the north gate, claiming to be the Wei crown prince. For this deception and misleading, he was sentenced to execution.

translations.literal: A man from Xiayang named Zhang Yannian went to the north gate, claiming to be the Wei crown prince. For this deception and misleading, he was sentenced to execution.

sentences.zh: 夏，罷天下亭母馬及馬弩關。

translations.literal: Summer, abolished world pavilion mother horses and horse crossbow passes.
translations.idiomatic: In summer, the pavilion mares throughout the realm and the horse crossbow checkpoints were abolished.

translations.literal: In summer, the pavilion mares throughout the realm and the horse crossbow checkpoints were abolished.

sentences.zh: 六月，封皇后父驃騎將軍上官安為桑樂侯。

translations.literal: Sixth month, enfeoffed empress father flying cavalry general Shangguan An as Sang Le marquis.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, the Empress's father, Flying Cavalry General Shangguan An, was enfeoffed as Marquis of Sang Le.

translations.literal: In the sixth month, the Empress's father, Flying Cavalry General Shangguan An, was enfeoffed as Marquis of Sang Le.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「朕以眇身獲保宗廟，戰戰栗栗，夙興夜寐，修古帝王之事，通保傅，傳孝經、論語、尚書，未云有明。

translations.literal: Edict said: I with small body obtained preserve ancestral temple, trembling trembling, early rise late sleep, cultivate ancient emperor king matters, understand tutors, transmit Filial Piety Classic, Analects, Documents, not yet said have clarity.
translations.idiomatic: An edict stated: 'Though I am but a humble person who has been fortunate enough to preserve the ancestral temples, I tremble with fear and rise early and retire late, cultivating the ways of the ancient emperors and kings. I have studied with my tutors and been taught the Classic of Filial Piety, the Analects, and the Documents, but I cannot yet claim to have attained clarity.'

sentences.zh: 其令三輔、太常舉賢良各二人，郡國文學高第各一人。
賜中二千石以下至吏民爵各有差。」

translations.literal: An edict stated: 'Though I am but a humble person who has been fortunate enough to preserve the ancestral temples, I tremble with fear and rise early and retire late, cultivating the ways of the ancient emperors and kings. I have studied with my tutors and been taught the Classic of Filial Piety, the Analects, and the Documents, but I cannot yet claim to have attained clarity.'

sentences.zh: 罷儋耳、真番郡。
秋，大鴻臚廣明、軍正王平擊益州，斬首捕虜三萬餘人，獲畜產五萬餘頭。
六月春正月，上耕于上林。
二月，詔有司問郡國所舉賢良文學民所疾苦。
議罷鹽鐵榷酤。
栘中監蘇武前使匈奴，留單于庭十九歲乃還，奉使全節，以武為典屬國，賜錢百萬。
夏，旱，大雩，大得舉火。

translations.literal: Summer, drought, great yu sacrifice, greatly obtained raised fire.
translations.idiomatic: In summer, there was drought. The great yu sacrifice was performed, and fire was successfully summoned from the heavens.

translations.literal: In summer, there was drought. The great yu sacrifice was performed, and fire was successfully summoned from the heavens.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，罷榷酤官，令民得以律占租，賣酒升四錢。

translations.literal: Autumn seventh month, abolished liquor monopoly official, ordered people able by law occupy rent, sell wine sheng four cash.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, the liquor monopoly official was abolished. The people were allowed to purchase wine-selling licenses by law, with each sheng of wine selling for four cash.

sentences.zh: 以邊塞闊遠，取天水、隴西、張掖郡各二縣置金城郡。

translations.literal: With border defenses broad distant, took Tianshui, Longxi, Zhangye commanderies each two counties established Jincheng commandery.
translations.idiomatic: Because the border defenses were extensive and distant, two counties each were taken from Tianshui, Longxi, and Zhangye commanderies to establish Jincheng commandery.

translations.literal: In the seventh month of autumn, the liquor monopoly official was abolished. The people were allowed to purchase wine-selling licenses by law, with each sheng of wine selling for four cash. Because the border defenses were extensive and distant, two counties each were taken from Tianshui, Longxi, and Zhangye commanderies to establish Jincheng commandery.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「鉤町侯毋波率其君長人民擊反者，斬首捕虜有功。

translations.literal: Edict said: Goutian marquis Wu Bo led his chiefs people attacked rebels, beheaded captured meritorious.
translations.idiomatic: An edict stated: 'Marquis Wu Bo of Goutian led his chiefs and people to attack the rebels, achieving merit in beheading and capturing them.'

sentences.zh: 其立毋波為鉤町王。

translations.literal: Therefore established Wu Bo as Goutian king.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, Wu Bo was established as King of Goutian.

sentences.zh: 大鴻臚廣明將率有功，賜爵關內侯，食邑。」

translations.literal: Grand herald Guangming led troops meritorious, granted title Guannei marquis, fief income.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Herald Guangming, having led troops with merit, was granted the title of Marquis within the Pass, with fief income.'

translations.literal: An edict stated: 'Marquis Wu Bo of Goutian led his chiefs and people to attack the rebels, achieving merit in beheading and capturing them.' Therefore, Wu Bo was established as King of Goutian. Grand Herald Guangming, having led troops with merit, was granted the title of Marquis within the Pass, with fief income.'

sentences.zh: 元鳳元年春，長公主共養勞苦，復以藍田益長公主湯沐邑。

translations.literal: Yuanfeng first year spring, elder princess together raised toilsome bitter, again with Lantian increased elder princess bath fief.
translations.idiomatic: In spring of the first year of Yuanfeng, because the Elder Princess had labored bitterly in raising the emperor together with others, Lantian was added to increase her bath fief.

translations.literal: In spring of the first year of Yuanfeng, because the Elder Princess had labored bitterly in raising the emperor together with others, Lantian was added to increase her bath fief.

sentences.zh: 泗水戴王前薨，以毋嗣，國除。

translations.literal: Sishui Dai king previously passed away, with no heir, state abolished.
translations.idiomatic: King Dai of Sishui had previously passed away with no heir, so his state was abolished.

sentences.zh: 後宮有遺腹子煖，相、內史不奏言，上聞而憐之，立煖為泗水王。

translations.literal: Rear palace had posthumous child Nuan, chancellor, interior minister not memorialized reported, emperor heard and pitied him, established Nuan as Sishui king.
translations.idiomatic: There was a posthumous son Nuan in the rear palace. The chancellor and interior minister did not report this. When the emperor heard of it, he pitied the child and established Nuan as King of Sishui.

sentences.zh: 相、內史皆下獄。

translations.literal: Chancellor, interior minister all sent to prison.
translations.idiomatic: The chancellor and interior minister were both imprisoned.

translations.literal: King Dai of Sishui had previously passed away with no heir, so his state was abolished. There was a posthumous son Nuan in the rear palace. The chancellor and interior minister did not report this. When the emperor heard of it, he pitied the child and established Nuan as King of Sishui. The chancellor and interior minister were both imprisoned.

sentences.zh: 三月，賜郡國所選有行義者涿郡韓福等五人帛，人五十匹，遣歸。
詔曰：「朕閔勞以官職之事，其務修孝弟以教鄉里。
令郡縣常以正月賜羊酒。
有不幸者賜衣被一襲，祠以中牢。」
武都氐人反，遣執金吾馬適建、龍镪侯韓增、大鴻臚廣明將三輔、太常徒，皆免刑擊之。
夏六月，赦天下。
秋七月乙亥晦，日有蝕之，既。
八月，改始元為元鳳。
九月，鄂邑長公主、燕王旦與左將軍上官桀、桀子票騎將軍安、御史大夫桑弘羊皆謀反，伏誅。

translations.literal: Ninth month, Eyi Elder Princess, Yan King Dan with Left General Shangguan Jie, Jie son Flying Cavalry General An, Imperial Secretary Sang Hongyang all plotted rebellion, suffered execution.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, the Elder Princess of Eyi, King Dan of Yan, Left General Shangguan Jie, Jie's son Flying Cavalry General An, and Imperial Secretary Sang Hongyang all plotted rebellion and were executed.

sentences.zh: 初，桀、 安父子與大將軍光爭權，欲害之，詐使人為燕王旦上書言光罪。

translations.literal: Initially, Jie, An father son with Grand General Guang contended power, wished to harm him, falsely made person for Yan King Dan memorial speak Guang crimes.
translations.idiomatic: Initially, Shangguan Jie and his son An contended for power with Grand General Huo Guang and wished to harm him. They falsely had someone submit a memorial to King Dan of Yan accusing Guang of crimes.

sentences.zh: 時上年十四，覺其詐。

translations.literal: At that time emperor age fourteen, perceived their deception.
translations.idiomatic: At that time the emperor was fourteen years old and perceived their deception.

sentences.zh: 後有譖光者，上輒怒曰：「大將軍國家忠臣，先帝所屬，敢有譖毀者，坐 之。」

translations.literal: Later had those who slandered Guang, emperor always angry said: Grand general state loyal minister, late emperor what entrusted, dare have slander defame ones, punish them.
translations.idiomatic: Later, when there were those who slandered Guang, the emperor would always angrily say: 'The Grand General is a loyal minister of the state, entrusted by the late emperor. Anyone who dares to slander or defame him shall be punished.'

sentences.zh: 光由是得盡忠。

translations.literal: Guang thereby able to exhaust loyalty.
translations.idiomatic: Because of this, Guang was able to serve with complete loyalty.

sentences.zh: 語在燕王、霍光傳。

translations.literal: Words in Yan King, Huo Guang biographies.
translations.idiomatic: The story is told in the Biographies of King Yan and Huo Guang.

translations.literal: In the ninth month, the Elder Princess of Eyi, King Dan of Yan, Left General Shangguan Jie, Jie's son Flying Cavalry General An, and Imperial Secretary Sang Hongyang all plotted rebellion and were executed. Initially, Shangguan Jie and his son An contended for power with Grand General Huo Guang and wished to harm him. They falsely had someone submit a memorial to King Dan of Yan accusing Guang of crimes. At that time the emperor was fourteen years old and perceived their deception. Later, when there were those who slandered Guang, the emperor would always angrily say: 'The Grand General is a loyal minister of the state, entrusted by the late emperor. Anyone who dares to slander or defame him shall be punished.' Because of this, Guang was able to serve with complete loyalty. The story is told in the Biographies of King Yan and Huo Guang.

sentences.zh: 冬十月，詔曰：「左將軍安陽侯桀、票騎將軍桑樂侯安、御史大夫弘羊皆數以邪枉干輔政，大將軍不聽， 而懷怨望，與燕王通謀，置驛往來相約結。

translations.literal: Winter tenth month, edict said: Left general Anyang marquis Jie, flying cavalry general Sang Le marquis An, imperial secretary Hongyang all repeatedly with crooked perverse interfered auxiliary government, grand general not listen, and harbored resentment, with Yan King communicated plotted, established post stations come go mutually agreed joined.
translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month of winter, an edict stated: 'Left General Marquis Jie of Anyang, Flying Cavalry General Marquis An of Sang Le, and Imperial Secretary Hongyang all repeatedly interfered in the auxiliary government with crooked and perverse actions. The Grand General would not listen, so they harbored resentment and communicated with King Yan in plotting, establishing post stations for coming and going and mutually agreeing to join together.'

sentences.zh: 燕王遣壽西長、孫縱之等賂遺長公主、丁外人、謁者杜延年、大將軍長史公孫遺等，交通私書，共謀令長公主置酒，伏兵 殺大將軍光，徵立燕王為天子，大逆毋道。

translations.literal: Yan King sent Shou Xichang, Sun Zongzhi etc. bribed gave elder princess, Ding outsider, usher Du Yannian, grand general chief secretary Gongsun Yi etc., communicated private letters, together plotted made elder princess set wine, ambush troops kill grand general Guang, summoned established Yan King as heavenly son, great rebellion without way.
translations.idiomatic: King Yan sent Shou Xichang, Sun Zongzhi, and others to bribe and give gifts to the Elder Princess, Ding Wai, Usher Du Yannian, the Grand General's Chief Secretary Gongsun Yi, and others. They communicated with private letters and together plotted to have the Elder Princess host a wine banquet with ambush troops to kill Grand General Guang, and summon and establish King Yan as Son of Heaven - a great rebellion against the proper way.

sentences.zh: 故稻田使者燕倉先發覺，以告大司農敞，敞告諫大夫延年，延年以聞。

translations.literal: Former rice field envoy Yan Cang first discovered, with told grand minister agriculture Chang, Chang told remonstrance grand master Yannian, Yannian with heard.
translations.idiomatic: The former rice field envoy Yan Cang first discovered this and informed Grand Minister of Agriculture Chang. Chang informed Remonstrance Grand Master Yannian, who reported it to the emperor.

sentences.zh: 丞相徵事任宮手捕斬桀，丞相少史王壽誘將安入府 門，皆已伏誅，吏民得以安。

translations.literal: Chancellor investigating affairs Ren Gong hand captured beheaded Jie, chancellor junior secretary Wang Shou lured led An entered office gate, all already suffered execution, officials people thereby able peaceful.
translations.idiomatic: The Chancellor's investigator Ren Gong personally captured and beheaded Jie. The Chancellor's junior secretary Wang Shou lured An to enter the office gate. They all suffered execution, and officials and people were thereby able to live in peace.

sentences.zh: 封延年、倉、宮、壽皆為列侯。」
又曰：「燕王迷惑失道，前與齊王子劉澤等為逆，抑而不揚，望王反道自新，今乃與長公主及左將軍 桀等謀危宗廟。
王及公主皆自伏辜。
其赦王太子建、公主子文信及宗室子與燕王、上官桀等謀反父母同產當坐者，皆免為庶人。
其吏為桀等所詿誤，未發覺在吏者， 除其罪。」

translations.literal: In the tenth month of winter, an edict stated: 'Left General Marquis Jie of Anyang, Flying Cavalry General Marquis An of Sang Le, and Imperial Secretary Hongyang all repeatedly interfered in the auxiliary government with crooked and perverse actions. The Grand General would not listen, so they harbored resentment and communicated with King Yan in plotting, establishing post stations for coming and going and mutually agreeing to join together.' King Yan sent Shou Xichang, Sun Zongzhi, and others to bribe and give gifts to the Elder Princess, Ding Wai, Usher Du Yannian, the Grand General's Chief Secretary Gongsun Yi, and others. They communicated with private letters and together plotted to have the Elder Princess host a wine banquet with ambush troops to kill Grand General Guang, and summon and establish King Yan as Son of Heaven - a great rebellion against the proper way. The former rice field envoy Yan Cang first discovered this and informed Grand Minister of Agriculture Chang. Chang informed Remonstrance Grand Master Yannian, who reported it to the emperor. The Chancellor's investigator Ren Gong personally captured and beheaded Jie. The Chancellor's junior secretary Wang Shou lured An to enter the office gate. They all suffered execution, and officials and people were thereby able to live in peace.

sentences.zh: 二年夏四月，上自建章宮徙未央宮，大置酒。
賜郎從官帛，及宗室子錢，人二十萬。
吏民獻牛酒者賜帛，人一匹。
六月，赦天下。

translations.literal: Sixth month, amnestied the world.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, there was a general amnesty.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「朕閔百姓未贍，前年減漕三百萬石。

translations.literal: Edict said: I pity common people not satisfied, previous year reduced tribute three hundred ten thousand shi.
translations.idiomatic: An edict stated: 'I pity the common people who are not yet satisfied. Last year we reduced the tribute by three million shi.'

sentences.zh: 頗省乘輿馬及菀馬，以補邊郡三輔傳馬。

translations.literal: Somewhat economized imperial carriage horses and park horses, to supplement border commanderies three adjutants relay horses.
translations.idiomatic: We somewhat economized on the imperial carriage horses and park horses in order to supplement the relay horses of the border commanderies and the Three Adjuncts.

sentences.zh: 其令郡國毋斂今年馬口錢，三輔、太常郡得以叔粟當賦。」

translations.literal: Moreover ordered commanderies kingdoms do not collect this year horse mouth money, three adjutants, grand minister ceremonies commanderies able use coarse grain substitute taxes.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, command the commanderies and kingdoms not to collect this year's horse tax. The Three Adjuncts and the Grand Minister of Ceremonies' commandery may use coarse grain to substitute for taxes.'

translations.literal: In the sixth month, there was a general amnesty. An edict stated: 'I pity the common people who are not yet satisfied. Last year we reduced the tribute by three million shi.' We somewhat economized on the imperial carriage horses and park horses in order to supplement the relay horses of the border commanderies and the Three Adjuncts. Moreover, command the commanderies and kingdoms not to collect this year's horse tax. The Three Adjuncts and the Grand Minister of Ceremonies' commandery may use coarse grain to substitute for taxes.'

sentences.zh: 三年春正月，泰山有大石自起立，上林有柳樹枯僵自起生。

translations.literal: Third year spring first month, Taishan had large stone self rose stood, Shanglin had willow tree withered stiff self rose lived.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the third year, on Mount Tai a large stone rose up by itself. In Shanglin Park a withered willow tree revived and came back to life.

translations.literal: In the first month of spring of the third year, on Mount Tai a large stone rose up by itself. In Shanglin Park a withered willow tree revived and came back to life.

sentences.zh: 罷中牟苑賦貧民。

translations.literal: Abolished Zhongmou park assigned poor people.
translations.idiomatic: The Zhongmou park was abolished and assigned to poor people.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「乃者民被水災，頗匱於食，朕虛倉廩，使使者振困乏。

translations.literal: Edict said: Recently people suffered flood disaster, considerably lacking food, I emptied granaries, sent envoys relieved impoverished lacking.
translations.idiomatic: An edict stated: 'Recently the people suffered from flood disasters and are considerably lacking in food. I have emptied the granaries and sent envoys to relieve those in poverty and want.'

sentences.zh: 其止四年毋漕。

translations.literal: Moreover stop fourth year no tribute.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, cease the tribute for the fourth year.'

sentences.zh: 三年以前所振貸，非丞相御史所請，邊郡受牛者勿收責。」

translations.literal: Third year before what relieved loaned, not chancellor imperial secretary what requested, border commanderies received oxen ones do not collect responsibility.
translations.idiomatic: For what was relieved and loaned before the third year, if not requested by the chancellor or imperial secretary, do not collect repayment from those border commanderies that received oxen.'

translations.literal: The Zhongmou park was abolished and assigned to poor people. An edict stated: 'Recently the people suffered from flood disasters and are considerably lacking in food. I have emptied the granaries and sent envoys to relieve those in poverty and want.' Moreover, cease the tribute for the fourth year.' For what was relieved and loaned before the third year, if not requested by the chancellor or imperial secretary, do not collect repayment from those border commanderies that received oxen.'

sentences.zh: 夏四月，少府徐仁、廷尉王平、左馮翊賈勝胡皆坐縱反者，仁自殺，平、勝胡皆要斬。

translations.literal: Summer fourth month, lesser treasurer Xu Ren, court judge Wang Ping, left defender Jia Shenghu all sat released rebels, Ren committed suicide, Ping, Shenghu all waist cut.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, Lesser Treasurer Xu Ren, Court Judge Wang Ping, and Left Defender Jia Shenghu were all convicted of releasing rebels. Ren committed suicide, while Ping and Shenghu were both sentenced to execution.

translations.literal: In the fourth month of summer, Lesser Treasurer Xu Ren, Court Judge Wang Ping, and Left Defender Jia Shenghu were all convicted of releasing rebels. Ren committed suicide, while Ping and Shenghu were both sentenced to execution.

sentences.zh: 冬，遼東烏桓反，以中郎將范明友為度遼將軍，將北邊七郡郡二千騎擊之。
四年春正月丁亥，帝加元服，見于高廟。
賜諸侯王、丞相、大將軍、列侯、宗室下至吏民金帛牛酒各有差。
賜中二千石以下及天下民爵。
毋收四年、五年口賦。
三年以前逋更賦未入者，皆勿收。
令天下酺五日。
甲戌，丞相千秋薨。
夏四月，詔曰：「度遼將軍明友前以羌騎校尉將羌王侯君長以下擊益州反虜，後復率擊武都反氐，今破烏桓，斬虜獲生，有功。

translations.literal: Summer fourth month, edict said: Cross Liao general Ming You previously as Qiang cavalry colonel led Qiang kings marquises chiefs below attacked Yizhou rebel bandits, afterwards again led attacked Wudu rebel Di, now broken Wuhuan, beheaded captured alive, have merit.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, an edict stated: 'General Ming You, who crosses the Liao, previously as Qiang Cavalry Colonel led Qiang kings, marquises, and chiefs and below to attack the rebel bandits of Yizhou, and afterwards again led troops to attack the rebel Di of Wudu. Now he has defeated the Wuhuan, beheaded and captured alive, and has merit.'

sentences.zh: 其封明友為平陵侯。

translations.literal: Therefore enfeoffed Ming You as Pingling marquis.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, enfeoff Ming You as Marquis of Pingling.

sentences.zh: 平樂監傅介子持節使，誅斬樓蘭王安，歸首縣北闕，封義陽侯。」

translations.literal: Ping Le supervisor Fu Jiezhi held tally envoy, executed beheaded Loulan king An, returned head hung north gate, enfeoffed Yiyang marquis.
translations.idiomatic: Ping Le Supervisor Fu Jiezhi, holding imperial tally as envoy, executed and beheaded King An of Loulan, returned and hung the head at the north gate, and was enfeoffed as Marquis of Yiyang.'

translations.literal: In the fourth month of summer, an edict stated: 'General Ming You, who crosses the Liao, previously as Qiang Cavalry Colonel led Qiang kings, marquises, and chiefs and below to attack the rebel bandits of Yizhou, and afterwards again led troops to attack the rebel Di of Wudu. Now he has defeated the Wuhuan, beheaded and captured alive, and has merit.' Therefore, enfeoff Ming You as Marquis of Pingling. Ping Le Supervisor Fu Jiezhi, holding imperial tally as envoy, executed and beheaded King An of Loulan, returned and hung the head at the north gate, and was enfeoffed as Marquis of Yiyang.'

sentences.zh: 五月丁丑，孝文廟正殿火，上及群臣皆素服。

translations.literal: Fifth month dingchou day, Filial Wen temple main hall fire, emperor and ministers all plain clothes.
translations.idiomatic: On the dingchou day of the fifth month, the main hall of the Filial Wen Temple caught fire. The emperor and all ministers wore mourning clothes.

sentences.zh: 發中二千石將五校作治，六日成。

translations.literal: Dispatched central two thousand shi led five schools made repaired, six days completed.
translations.idiomatic: Central officials of two thousand shi were dispatched to lead the five schools in making repairs, which were completed in six days.

sentences.zh: 太常及廟令丞郎吏皆劾大不敬，會赦，太常轑陽侯德免為庶人。

translations.literal: Grand minister ceremonies and temple command vice gentleman officials all impeached great disrespect, met amnesty, grand minister ceremonies Liyang marquis De dismissed as commoner.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Minister of Ceremonies and the temple officials were all impeached for great disrespect. An amnesty occurred, so Grand Minister of Ceremonies Marquis De of Liyang was dismissed to become a commoner.

translations.literal: On the dingchou day of the fifth month, the main hall of the Filial Wen Temple caught fire. The emperor and all ministers wore mourning clothes. Central officials of two thousand shi were dispatched to lead the five schools in making repairs, which were completed in six days. The Grand Minister of Ceremonies and the temple officials were all impeached for great disrespect. An amnesty occurred, so Grand Minister of Ceremonies Marquis De of Liyang was dismissed to become a commoner.

sentences.zh: 六月，赦天下。

translations.literal: Sixth month, amnestied the world.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, there was a general amnesty.

translations.literal: In the sixth month, there was a general amnesty.

sentences.zh: 五年春正月，廣陵王來朝，益國萬一千戶，賜錢二千萬，黃金二百斤，劍二，安車一，乘馬二駟。

translations.literal: Fifth year spring first month, Guangling king came court, increased state eleven thousand households, granted money twenty million, gold two hundred jin, swords two, peaceful carriage one, riding horses two teams.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the fifth year, King Guangling came to court. His state was increased by eleven thousand households, and he was granted twenty million cash, two hundred jin of gold, two swords, one peaceful carriage, and two teams of riding horses.

translations.literal: In the first month of spring of the fifth year, King Guangling came to court. His state was increased by eleven thousand households, and he was granted twenty million cash, two hundred jin of gold, two swords, one peaceful carriage, and two teams of riding horses.

sentences.zh: 夏，大旱。

translations.literal: Summer, great drought.
translations.idiomatic: In summer, there was a great drought.

translations.literal: In summer, there was a great drought.

sentences.zh: 六月，發三輔及郡國惡少年吏有告劾亡者，屯遼東。

translations.literal: Sixth month, dispatched three adjutants and commanderies kingdoms bad young men officials had accusation fled ones, garrisoned Liaodong.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, bad youths and officials from the Three Adjuncts and commanderies who had accusations against them and fled were dispatched to garrison Liaodong.

translations.literal: In the sixth month, bad youths and officials from the Three Adjuncts and commanderies who had accusations against them and fled were dispatched to garrison Liaodong.

sentences.zh: 秋，罷象郡，分屬鬱林、牂柯。
冬十一月，大雷。
十二月庚戌，丞相訢薨。
六年春正月，募郡國徒築遼東玄菟城。
夏，赦天下。
詔曰：「夫穀賤傷農，今三輔、太常穀減賤，其令以叔粟當今年賦。」
右將軍張安世宿衛忠謹，封富平侯。
烏桓復犯塞，遣度遼將軍范明友擊之。
元平元年春二月，詔曰：「天下以農桑為本。
日者省用，罷不急官，減外繇，耕桑者益眾，而百姓未能家給，朕甚愍焉。
其減口賦錢。」
有司奏請減什三，上許之。
甲申，晨有流星，大如月，眾星皆隨西行。
夏四月癸未，帝崩于未央宮。
六月壬申，葬平陵。
